65994.summary: Some customers in Fort St. John are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
65994.title: Aug 23 - Fort St. John | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
